root.name: Asda Story
root.description: PC System RequirementsMinimumOS: Windows XP/VistaCPU: Pentium3 1GhzRAM: 256MBHDD: 1 GB freeGraphics Card: nVidia GeForce2 MX, ATI Radeon 7500DirectX: 9.0cRecommendedOS: Windows XP/VistaCPU: Pentium3 1Ghz or aboveRAM: 512 MB RAM or moreHDD: 2 GB freeGraphics Card: nVidia GeForce3 Ti or above TI Radeon 9200 or aboveDirectX: 9.0c or Better
